sql: select [Id], [SysUserId], [SysRoleId], [RoleType], [Nickname], [FullName], [Username], [Password], [Sex], [Mobile], [Email], [Avatar], [IdentityType] from t_SysUser WHERE SysUserId LIKE @SysUserId AND (FullName = @FullName OR @FullName IS NULL)

select [Id], [SysUserId], [SysRoleId], [RoleType], [Nickname], [FullName], [Username], [Password], [Sex], [Mobile], [Email], [Avatar], [IdentityType] from t_SysUser WHERE (FullName = @FullName OR @FullName IS NULL) OR (Nickname = @Nickname OR @Nickname IS NULL)

select [Id], [SysUserId], [SysRoleId], [RoleType], [Nickname], [FullName], [Username], [Password], [Sex], [Mobile], [Email], [Avatar], [IdentityType] from t_SysUser WHERE (FullName = @FullName OR @FullName IS NULL) OR (Nickname = @Nickname OR @Nickname IS NULL)
